info.description: Board management API for weAlist project management platform
info.title: Board Service API

get.description: Get boards for a project with optional filters

post.description: Create a new board card (task/issue) in a project

get.description: Get a specific board by ID (project member only)

put.description: Update a board (author or ADMIN+ only)

delete.description: Delete a board (soft delete, author or ADMIN+ only)

post.description: Create a new custom importance for a project (ADMIN+ only)

get.description: Get a specific custom importance by ID

put.description: Update a custom importance (ADMIN+ only, system defaults cannot be updated)

delete.description: Delete a custom importance (ADMIN+ only, system defaults cannot be deleted)

get.description: Get all custom importances for a project

put.description: Update the display order of custom importances (ADMIN+ only)

get.description: Get all custom roles for a project

put.description: Update the display order of custom roles (ADMIN+ only)

get.description: Get all custom stages for a project

put.description: Update the display order of custom stages (ADMIN+ only)

post.description: Create a new custom role for a project (ADMIN+ only)

get.description: Get a specific custom role by ID

put.description: Update a custom role (ADMIN+ only, system defaults cannot be updated)

delete.description: Delete a custom role (ADMIN+ only, system defaults cannot be deleted)

post.description: Create a new custom stage for a project (ADMIN+ only)

get.description: Get a specific custom stage by ID

put.description: Update a custom stage (ADMIN+ only, system defaults cannot be updated)

delete.description: Delete a custom stage (ADMIN+ only, system defaults cannot be deleted)

get.description: Get all projects in a workspace (workspace member only)

post.description: Create a new project in a workspace (workspace member only)
Request to join a project (workspace member only)

put.description: Approve or reject a join request (OWNER/ADMIN only)

get.description: Search projects in a workspace by name or description
Get join requests for a project (OWNER/ADMIN only)
Get all members of a project (member only)

delete.description: Remove a member from project (OWNER/ADMIN only, cannot remove OWNER or self)

put.description: Update a member's role in project (OWNER only)

get.description: Get the board organized by roles with user-specific column and board orders

put.description: Update the display order of boards within a specific role column (drag-and-drop)
put.summary: Update board order in role column

put.description: Update the display order of role columns (drag-and-drop)

get.description: Get the board organized by stages with user-specific column and board orders

put.description: Update the display order of boards within a specific stage column (drag-and-drop)
put.summary: Update board order in stage column

put.description: Update the display order of stage columns (drag-and-drop)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
